title: PLAZA ORB / plazatilecoat
description: This Shivers initiates the coat quest. It is an Easy check.

dialogueTree.title: Shivers: "I am here... Please, listen... It w..."
dialogueTree.text: I am here... Please, listen... It will be hard to hear me…

links.title: You: "I hear you! Please, talk to me! Wha..."
links.text: I hear you! Please, talk to me! What do you want?

links.title: Shivers: "I am so glad… I have no time... The..."
links.text: I am so glad… I have no time... The place of many words, before the one so much like yourself... Try to hear me there...

links.title: Shivers: "I am what has always been here for..."
links.text: I am what has always been here for you… Please... The place of many words, before the one so much like yourself... Try to hear me there...

links.title: You: "Oh, no. No, no. Whatever you are, I..."
links.text: Oh, no. No, no. Whatever you are, I don't want you in my head.

links.title: Shivers: "Forgive me... I have no other way t..."
links.text: Forgive me... I have no other way to reach you... Please -- the place of many words, before the one so much like yourself... Try to hear me there...
